TYRRHENIAN SEA.
DNC 08.

PERSONS ON BOARD, IN 39-40.55N 011-42.66E AT
160421Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
